sentences.sContent: Can you account for your movements on that night?
sentences.sCn: 你能说明一下你那天晚上的行踪吗？

sentences.sContent: Afro-Americans account for 12% of the US population.
sentences.sCn: 非裔美国人占美国人口的12%。

sentences.sContent: It has, from all accounts, been a successful marriage.
sentences.sCn: 谁都说这是一桩美满的婚姻。

sentences.sContent: The accounts for last year showed a profit of $2 million.
sentences.sCn: 去年的账目显示利润为200万美元。
